page.title: 12 Dairyland
page.content:
Dairyland is on the A3058,near Kestle Mill, four miles from Newquay. It is part of a 550 acre working farm, where the public can watch 160 cows (Friesians) milked to music in one of Europes most modern rotary milking parlours.The whole complex is owned by Mr Rex Davey.
{***************
There is a playground for children with sandpits, swings, slides, see-saws, space rocket and Wendy House.
{***************}
There is also a pet corner where children can handle kittens,rabbits and guinea pigs. In the Animal Ark meet calves,lambs,kids and piglets.
